profile.desc: Computer engineer with 4 years of experience. Expertise in the fields of development and computer networks. Mastery of several types of computer languages and able to work on different platforms. Autonomous but able to work in a team. Great availability.

formations.diplome: ENGINEERING GRADUATE IN TELECOMMUNICATION AND COMPUTER NETWORKS
formations.details: Mobile networks, computer networks, Java, Arduino, web, Cisco, security and web developments

experiences.tache: design and production of a web application allows you to create a local database from the collection of data found on an FTP server in the Country of France

design and development of a web application which contains the following modules:
Design of the database according to our needs
Creation of the various APIs necessary for the good of our application with the Node JS (client / server communication in real time)
Development of the different interfaces and pages on the client side such as: Authentication, registration, configuration of accounts, addition and deletion of project elements, display of project contents, respecting the dynamic navigation between these different interfaces (Angular JS work tool )
• Research and use of RSA and ALGamel cryptography for the encryption and decryption of keys, messages and files
• Automation of an application with Windows APIs using the Autohotkey platform
• Test penetration with Kali Lunix using attack and hacking tools such as:
o Nmap
o Metasploit 2
o Wireshark
o Burp suite
o Armitage
• Test de performance with the Apache Jemeter tool
• Automation of web application tests with Selinium on the Java platform
• Organize test cases with the Testlink test management system
• Develop windows applications on the Windev and Windev Mobile platform

Use the documents necessary for filling out the customs form.
Process information on the TTN system
Go out on a visit with customs agents to check the goods
design and production of an Arduino-based supervision system (monitoring from a website)
Develop a stock management website: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, MySQL (database)
Realization of a speed regulator as needed for use at the base of PIC16f877 (Assembler, C, C ++)

Discover the notion of an automated system
Draw a graph of the entire operation of the system
Highlight the different methods of designing or using these automated systems
